Articles.Content:
Edited November 5, 2020 by wbrouwer
Clearing personal data, would prefer if thread could be deleted
I do think this goes into addon development.

I am currently working on music that can be added into the game as soon as it is possible. I want to know if someone has already found a way to put in custom music + I am looking for people to help me on this project.

Iannic has a mod that will play any files put into a specific folder, called Muziker: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/46003-0-21-Muziker-0-1-1

I used to beta test for a plugin that gave ksp dynamic music, which was before ksp even had music. But I think the whole thread is gone after the forums died. I still have the files tough... let me check them. Edit: aah it's just called "Music_Player_11". It could generate a list of mp3's that would play from a menu.

Edited September 2, 2013 by Blinkin
